completedAt.description: Date and time in [RFC3339 format](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.8) that the signing job was completed.

createdAt.description: Date and time in [RFC3339 format](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.8) that the signing job was created.

destination.description: The S3 bucket in which to save your signed object. See Destination below for details.

ignoreSigningJobFailure.description: Set this argument to `true` to ignore signing job failures and retrieve failed status and reason. Default `false`.

jobId.description: The ID of the signing job on output.

jobInvoker.description: The IAM entity that initiated the signing job.

jobOwner.description: The AWS account ID of the job owner.

platformDisplayName.description: A human-readable name for the signing platform associated with the signing job.

platformId.description: The platform to which your signed code image will be distributed.

profileName.description: The name of the profile to initiate the signing operation.

profileVersion.description: The version of the signing profile used to initiate the signing job.

requestedBy.description: The IAM principal that requested the signing job.

revocationRecords.description: A revocation record if the signature generated by the signing job has been revoked. Contains a timestamp and the ID of the IAM entity that revoked the signature.

signatureExpiresAt.description: The time when the signature of a signing job expires.

signedObjects.description: Name of the S3 bucket where the signed code image is saved by code signing.

source.description: The S3 bucket that contains the object to sign. See Source below for details.

statusReason.description: String value that contains the status reason.

destination.description: The S3 bucket in which to save your signed object. See Destination below for details.
